name: Avoid using 'java.System.exit()'
description: Java artifacts should not use 'java.System.exit()'  for application deployed on a Web Server or an Application Server (when web.xml and/or ejb-jar.xml file are present)
output:
This report lists all java artifacts using 'java.System.exit()'.
It provides the following information:
 - Artifact full name
rationale: Using 'java.System.exit()' is prohibited since it goes against the Exception error handling model.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling

qualityStandards.name: J2EE Bad Practices: Use of System.exit()
qualityStandards.description: A J2EE application uses System.exit(), which also shuts down its container.
